trans-unit.source: The ISEMenuItemCollection Object
trans-unit.target: ISEMenuItemCollection 对象

trans-unit.source: The ISEMenuItemCollection Object
trans-unit.target: ISEMenuItemCollection 对象

trans-unit.source: An **ISEMenuItemCollection** object is a collection of **ISEMenuItem** objects.
trans-unit.target: **ISEMenuItemCollection** 对象是 **ISEMenuItem** 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: It is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItemCollection class.
trans-unit.target: 它是 Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEOptions 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An example is the **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu.Submenus** object that is used to customize the **Add\-On** menu in Windows PowerShellÂ® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE).
trans-unit.target: 一个示例是用于在 Windows PowerShellÂ® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) 中自定义 **Add\-On** 菜单的 **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu.Submenus** 对象。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Add\(string DisplayName, System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock Action, System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture Shortcut \)
trans-unit.target: 添加\（字符串 DisplayName, System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock Action, System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture 快捷方式\）

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 和更高版本中受支持。

trans-unit.source: Adds a menu item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将菜单项添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: DisplayName
trans-unit.target: DisplayName

trans-unit.source: The display name of the menu to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的菜单显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 操作

trans-unit.source: The **System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock** object that specifies the action that is associated with this menu item.
trans-unit.target: **System.Management.Automation.ScriptBlock** 对象指定与此菜单项关联的操作。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut
trans-unit.target: 快捷方式

trans-unit.source: The keyboard shortcut for the action.
trans-unit.target: 此操作的键盘快捷方式

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: 返回

trans-unit.source: The ISEMenuItem object that was just added.
trans-unit.target: 刚添加 ISEMenuItem 对象。

trans-unit.source: Clear\(\)
trans-unit.target: Clear\(\)

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 和更高版本中受支持。

trans-unit.source: Removes all submenus from the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 从菜单项中删除所有子菜单。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
